name: Rare Fiddlement
description: Got a petty crime that needs solving? Rare Fiddlement is on the case! This observant Rare Magical has successfully channeled the Light Element into a concentrated beam of Ultra-Spy-olet rays that illuminates telltale traces left behind by unwitting Monsters, critters, and culprits. Slobber from a drooling Gob? Check. Puffs of Wimmzy mist? Noted. Flowah petal pollen? Achoo- You get it! Whatever your preposterous case or pesky prankster, Rare Fiddlement's keen blue gaze is following the trail.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 1 hr 30 min, Enhanced Time: 19 hr 7 min 30 sec
